divs: Sighting DetailsObject was first seen by son Alva Allen on the front deck of their house onNeedles Drive. He called the other 3 family members. The object was muchfurther away perhaps 3 miles near the DouglasEl Paso Co. line. Moved to the NEnear the Elbert Co. line. The size estimate is based on the two previoussightings.Helicopters were seen appoarching from the S.W. Fort CarsonSon Alva at first insisted it was a radio tower, but radio towers dont move. Numerous digital picture were taking, but all they show is lights. Im not evensure we got all the pictures. I ran out of floppy disks, but there were atleast 1 set of duplicate pictures.Family members eventually got cold and board and went inside.--Submitted by EdBurke
